Key Match Events: Derek Hill had three hits and the second two-homer game of his career.
Kyle Stowers had three hits and four RBI.
J. Tinoco earned the win with 2.1 innings pitched, allowing 2 hits, 0 earned runs, 3 strikeouts, and 0 walks.
B. Blalock took the loss with 4.0 innings pitched, allowing 9 hits, 6 earned runs, 3 strikeouts, and 1 walk.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was held at Coors Field in Denver, Colorado with an attendance of 20,949.
The game lasted 2 hours and 58 minutes.
